## Description {#details}

<code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/bitfield">Bitfield</a></code> deals with the following type:

<ul>
<li>unsigned enums</li>
<li>signed and unsigned integer</li>
<li><code>bool</code> Internally though we only manipulate integer with well defined and consistent semantics, this excludes typed enums and <code>bool</code> that are replaced with their unsigned counterparts. The correct type is restored in the public API.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 197 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitfields-h">Bitfields.h</a>.
